properties.name: Corelight - Multiple files sent over HTTP with abnormal requests
properties.description: 'Detects sources sending multiple compressed files greater than 10MBs sent over HTTP in a short amount of time.'
properties.query:
let threshold = 25;
let fl_size_threshold = 10000000;
Corelight
| where EventType =~ 'http'
| where HttpRequestMethod in~ ('POST', 'PUT')
| where isempty(HttpReferrerOriginal)
| where tolong(HttpRequestBodyBytes) > fl_size_threshold
| summarize count() by UrlOriginal, SrcIpAddr, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr
